entry.title: World's Finest
entry.summary:
Author: Salamence_373

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,914Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Clark is new to Metropolis after landing his dream job as a journalist at the Daily Planet that's in a frenzy covering the new hero Superman that's moved to town. Bruce has been fighting as Batman for three years but still has a long way to go juggling his double life. These two have been searching for meaning as they strive towards their ultimate goals on an inevitable collision course. Their rivalry sparks new passion from both of them as they find out they aren't so different after all, while finding what's been missing from their lives. They each bring out the best in each other and make them better heroes and people as they build for a better tomorrow.

entry.title: Can't Stop the Feeling (or the Gay Panic)
entry.summary:
Author: fluffpuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,853Chapters: 3/9Kudos: 39

Summary: It starts with a karaoke night. Or maybe it doesn‚Äôt.Over the course of one week, a series of completely unrelated (read: wildly dramatic, suspiciously timed) events unfold across the lives of several very queer, very emotionally unstable heroes. There‚Äôs tension. There‚Äôs pining. There‚Äôs pop music. And absolutely no one is communicating.Each chapter features:‚ú® One shipüé∂ One pop songüí• One emotional crisisüíã One bad decision (minimum!)By the time the week is over, someone‚Äôs cried to Taylor Swift, someone‚Äôs made out to Kylie Minogue, someone‚Äôs broken a window, and at least three people have had a gay awakening. Maybe the universe is trying to tell them something. Or maybe the super group chat is cursed.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,569Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 68

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what would‚Äôve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,301Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 38

Bruce‚Äôs eyes adjust, and the full horror of what is happening hits him. The discs overhead aren‚Äôt filtering the light, they‚Äôre concentrating it, aiming it directly to where Clark is lying on the exam chair. Bruce‚Äôs stomach drops as Clark screams, writhing on the chair as the automatons pin him down.Like a bug being cooked under a magnifying glass.

entry.title: Too Good to be True
entry.summary:
Author: Belayoda

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,780Chapters: 1/11Kudos: 21

Summary: This is the story of how Bruce Wayne - billionaire, socialite, future CEO of Wayne Enterprises (once his father retires) - fell in love with Superman, and then Kal-El, and then Clark Kent. And it all happened because Superman saved him from a collapsing building. And the rest is history as they say.Oh and by the way, what is a ‚ÄòBat-Man‚Äô? ‚ÄúOh please,‚Äù Bruce smirked, trying to hide most of his swooning behind bravado, ‚ÄúMr Wayne is my father - call me Bruce.‚Äù And in his incessant manners, held out a hand for the man to shake, while properly taking in his saviour for this first time. He was wearing a bright blue and red get up, with a large ‚ÄòS‚Äô plastered over his chest. It was a bit garish, but Bruce could see the outline of his muscles through the tight suit, so he wasn‚Äôt complaining. The man looked surprised at Bruce‚Äôs comment before smiling timidly and shaking the outheld hand. ‚ÄúSuperman,‚Äù he replied. Or in which Bruce Wayne lives his dream life. Or so it seems.

entry.title: Built from Broken Things
entry.summary:
Author: Leaf_46

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,576Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Bruce had always been alone, or he had Alfred. But he now found himself in a new role. Mentor of some sorts to the 8 year old boy. The first few weeks had Been rough. The boy was broken in so many ways and it became apparent to Bruce that he needed more than a mentor.This fic is a mix of father son relationship between Bruce and Dick in the beginning and how it changes over time and later on as times passes the rest of the batfam joins in.
